title: Mysterious app '10510' draining battery like crazy
content:
Hi community,

There's a mysterious app draining my battery, it only shows '10510'. Initially it seemed to be Facebook, so I've uninstalled FB app and installed FB Lite instead.
A couple of hours later, the main battery drainer was replaced for something called '10510', that also says 'used for 0 mins'.
I can't stop the process nor identify its source, but it's killing my battery.
Just to be clear, I've already restarted the phone a couple of times and also double-checked by killing all running apps.
I'm in Android 11 beta.

Any idea?
Thanks!
